resources.string: It allows to take a photo and process it eliminating its metadata but without losing them.
It allows to select one or several images of the device and process them eliminating their metadata but without losing them.
Allows you to run a service that will automatically process new images added to the Camera directory.
It allows to reestablish the metadata of an image previously processed with this application.
It allows to visualize the metadata of an image processed with this application.
